item.title: KO
item.description: score:96 Chances: The Coca-Cola Company is expanding its product offerings to include ginger beer, tonic water, and club soda, which could lead to significant revenue growth. The company’s leadership team is making a significant move by engaging with government officials and bottling partners in India, presenting a ripe opportunity for Coca-Cola to broaden its reach.
